title: Film Noir's Hidden Gem: For You I Die Unveiled

sources.title: Film Noir's Hidden Gem: For You I Die Unveiled
sources.description:
https://publicdomainmovies.info/ Step into the world of classic film noir with "For You I Die," a hidden gem from 1947 now available among public domain movies. Directed by John Reinhardt, this captivating noir stars Cathy Downs, Paul Langton, and Mischa Auer. The film follows Johnny Coulter, a convict forced into a prison break, who finds refuge at a roadside diner, entangling with complex characters like Hope Novak. As the tension rises, Johnny struggles with redemption and survival amidst the shadowy, gripping atmosphere of film noir. Discover the historical significance of this old film, where themes of loyalty, betrayal, and redemption intertwine. For fans of classic movies, this is a must-watch that encapsulates the essence of vintage cinema. Don't miss the chance to explore more public domain films and subscribe to our newsletter for updates on timeless treasures!

1:12:35 - Smitty's Death
1:13:20 - Warden's Decision
1:14:10 - Luke and Dragline Goodbye
